mapper.sql: id, server_name, method_name, type, create_time, update_time, remark, elapsed_time
mapper.insert: insert into t_dxt_interface_log (id,order_no,server_name, method_name, type, create_time, update_time, remark, elapsed_time, request_message, response_message) values (#{id},#{orderNo}, #{serverName}, #{methodName}, #{type}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remark}, #{elapsedTime}, #{requestMessage}, #{responseMessage})
